Posts.Content: Hello I had and still have an indentation.  You may be offered reconstructive surgery for this. I  chose not to and wear an insert in my bra which makes my breasts equal. I found though that it ruined my cleaage but I now am atbthr stage where I don' care. Don't stress too much it' normal as thrybhave residents lump.  Hope this helps x
Posts.Title: Indentation after lumpectomy
